I also verify that all the information provided is accurate to the best of my knowledge.
labels.registration: 1. Registration: Registration at Soutien-Omni-Scolaire is confirmed upon receiving our confirmation. An initial assessment may be required to identify specific needs and the student's level.
labels.payments: 2. Payments: Tuition fees must be paid upon receiving the invoice, within 7 days. We accept various payment methods, including bank transfers and Twint. Any delay in payment may incur additional charges.
labels.cancellations: 3. Cancellations: If a session needs to be canceled, please inform us at least 48 hours in advance. Sessions canceled later than this deadline or not canceled will be fully charged.
labels.latenessAndAbsences: 4. Delays and Absences: Punctuality is encouraged for all students. Frequent delays or unjustified absences may lead to a revision of the student's registration.
labels.behavior: 5. Behavior: Respectful and appropriate behavior is expected from all students and their parents within Soutien-Omni-Scolaire. Inappropriate behavior may lead to exclusion from the program.
labels.confidentiality: 6. Confidentiality: We commit to protecting the privacy and personal information of our students and their families and will not disclose this information without prior consent.
labels.serviceModifications: 7. Service Modifications: Soutien-Omni-Scolaire reserves the right to modify schedules, teachers, or other service aspects as needed.
labels.copyright: 8. Copyright: Educational material provided by Soutien-Omni-Scolaire is copyrighted and intended for the student's personal use only.
labels.termination: 9. Termination: Soutien-Omni-Scolaire or the parent/guardian may terminate the registration with one month's notice for valid reasons.
labels.additionalInformation: For more information or details about our services, please visit our website: www.soutien-omni-scolaire.ch. Registering for our services implies acceptance of these general terms and conditions.
labels.asTheParentGuardian: As the parent/guardian of the minor or adult student, I have read and accept the general conditions of Soutien-Omni-Scolaire.
